query:
SELECT s.*, u.openId, u.name as userName 
FROM suppliers s 
LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE openId LIKE CONCAT('%', s.id, '@supplier.com%') LIMIT 1)
WHERE s.id = 12;
